channel.title: notes on Nicola Iarocci
channel.description: Recent content in notes on Nicola Iarocci

item.title: Half-century of service
item.description: Phil and Jeremy both turned 50 this year. They took the opportunity to write some half-century notes. Having turned 50 myself and inspired by them, I thought I would do the same. 0-10 I see the light 50 years ago in Molise, a southern region of Italy that also happens to be the smallest and less known. One year later, my brother joins the family. Our parents are from a small village in Molise heights.
